metadata.title: Anti-Itch Dual Action Gel-Box of 25
features: PROUDLY AMERICAN-MADE - CoreTex's entire line of antihistamine lotion is made right here, in the heart of the USA

EFFECTIVE ITCH SUPPRESSANT - With Diphenhydramine Hydrochloride (an incredibly effective anti-histamine) as one of the active ingredients in our anti itch cream packets, you'll experience relief from poisonous plant effects and other uncomfortable rashes

POWERFUL PAIN RELIEF - Using Camphor (a powerful pain reliever) as another one of our main ingredients in our skin rashes and itch treatment packets, you'll also experience relief from the pain caused by bug bites and other mild skin-based pains
FAST ACTING - Once the gel is applied, notice your itches or mild pains dissipate almost immediately thanks to our water-based formula that helps the gel quickly absorb into the skin

TRAVEL READY - Our bottles of anti itch dual action gel travel incredibly easily, being that each bottle is small, light, and carefully sealed! Take these anti itch gel packets with you on your next hike, camping trip, or day in the park
description: Don't let annoying and itchy rashes or bug bites ruin your outdoor fun. CoreTex's dual-action anti-itch gel uses a unique mixture of topical anti-histamines and pain relievers to put a stop to the itchiness and pain that comes from a wide variety of insect bites, poisonous plant oils, and other mild skin-based pains. Not only does our gel provide relief from all of these different annoyances, but it also acts incredibly fast with the water-based formula we've developed. As soon as your are beginning to feel any sort of negative sensation, just take a packet out, liberally apply to the affected area and almost immediately feel relief! Take these packets wherever you go to make sure you are covered in the case of an unfortunate encounter. Be Safe. Be Prepared. Be Protected with CoreTex Products!
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "4.09 x 3.94 x 1.73 inches; 0.32 Ounces", "Date First Available": "September 3, 2013", "Manufacturer": "Coretex Products"}
